programme.title: Live UEFA Europa League
programme.desc: Slavia Prague v Arsenal (Kick-off 8.00pm). Coverage of the quarter-final second-leg clash from Eden Arena, as both sides look to progress into this years semi-finals. The home side will looking to knock out their third British team of the tournament, after two previous two-leg victories against Leicester City and Rangers. They beat Leicester 2-0 across two legs before defeating Rangers 3-1 in the round-of-16..(n)
